title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content:
the weapon to kill the Nightsong -- Spear of Night. Once you collect all 4 Umbral Gems, use the floating platform to reach Inner Sanctum.

Soft-step Trial: You need to skulk to the end of the maze without being spotted by the shadows. Using an invisibility spell and turn base mode works well. But be careful of the traps. You need to find a Soft-Step Key (on the table of a hidden room) or use lockpick to open the final gate. Alternatively, you can use Dimension Door to bypass this trial. Self-Sam
